mapper.update: update l_county set countyid=countyid ,countycode=#{countycode} ,countyname=#{countyname} ,orderno=#{orderno} ,longitude=#{longitude} ,latitude=#{latitude} where countyid=#{countyid}

update l_county set countyid=countyid ,countycode=#{countycode} ,countyname=#{countyname} ,orderno=#{orderno} ,longitude=#{longitude} ,latitude=#{latitude} where 1=1 and countyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and countyid =#{Where_Id} and countyid=#{Where_countyid} and countycode=#{Where_countycode} and countyname=#{Where_countyname} and orderno=#{Where_orderno} and longitude=#{Where_longitude} and latitude=#{Where_latitude}
mapper.select: select t.countyid "countyid", t.countycode "countycode", t.countyname "countyname", t.orderno "orderno", t.longitude "longitude", t.latitude "latitude" from l_county t where countyid=#{countyid}

select t.countyid "countyid", t.countycode "countycode", t.countyname "countyname", t.orderno "orderno", t.longitude "longitude", t.latitude "latitude" from l_county t where 1=1 and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.countycode=#{countycode} and t.countyname=#{countyname} and t.orderno=#{orderno} and t.longitude=#{longitude} and t.latitude=#{latitude}

select t.countyid "countyid", t.countycode "countycode", t.countyname "countyname", t.orderno "orderno", t.longitude "longitude", t.latitude "latitude" from l_county t where 1=1 and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.countycode=#{countycode} and t.countyname=#{countyname} and t.orderno=#{orderno} and t.longitude=#{longitude} and t.latitude=#{latitude}
mapper.delete: delete from l_county where 1=1 and countyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and countyid =#{Where_Id} and countyid=#{Where_countyid} and countycode=#{Where_countycode} and countyname=#{Where_countyname} and orderno=#{Where_orderno} and longitude=#{Where_longitude} and latitude=#{Where_latitude}
mapper.select: select t.countyid "countyid", t.countycode "countycode", t.countyname "countyname", t.orderno "orderno", t.longitude "longitude", t.latitude "latitude" from l_county t where 1=1 and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.countycode=#{countycode} and t.countyname=#{countyname} and t.orderno=#{orderno} and t.longitude=#{longitude} and t.latitude=#{latitude}

select count(*) from l_county t where 1=1 and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.countyid!=#{NoId} and t.countycode=#{countycode} and t.countyname=#{countyname} and t.orderno=#{orderno} and t.longitude=#{longitude} and t.latitude=#{latitude}
